title: Stylish Features, Close to I 225, Incredible Amenities
posting_body: ['Enjoy direct access to I-225, state-of-the-art fitness equipment, complimentary wifi, playgrounds and splash pads, sport courts and ample parking make Aurora Hills Apartment Homes unlike anything else in the area.', 'This versatile one bedroom one bathroom apartment has all the space that you need!', 'Great in-unit and onsite amenities, our community offers quick access to everyday essentials, recreation, and entertainment.', 'Units are available now and we offer pre-leasing!', 'VIEW OUR WEBSITE:', '<URL>/', 'Aurora Hills, managed by BLDG Management', '11850 E. Maple Ave.', 'Aurora, CO 80012', 'show contact info', 'Monday 8:30am - 5:30pm', 'Tuesday 8:30am - 5:30pm', 'Wednesday 8:30am - 5:30pm', 'Thursday 8:30am - 5:30pm', 'Friday 8:30am - 5:30pm', 'Saturday 10:00am - 5:00pm', 'Apartment Features', '* Disposal', '* Window Coverings', '* Air Conditioning', '* Pre-wired for internet and cable', '* Microwave', '* Central Heat and Air', '* Vertical Blinds', '* Private Balcony', '* Electric Stove', '* Refrigerator', '* Dishwasher', '* Private Patio or Private Balcony (on select apartments)', '* Ceiling Fan', '* Private Patio', '* Walk-in Closet', 'Community Features', '* Volleyball Court', '* Playground', '* Sun Deck', '* Multi Function Study Rooms with Copier and Computers', '* Guest Parking', '* Package Acceptance', '* Short Term Lease Available', '*', "Our prices can change daily, price listed is based on today's availability.", 'Call for details.', '* Minutes from Restaurants, Shopping, and Much More', '* Cardio Room', '* We are a social community!', 'Find our Yelp, Facebook or Twitter page online.', '* Professionally Managed', '* Liability Insurance is Required', '* Fitness Studio', '* Foosball', '* Bark Park', '* Landscaped Courtyards', '* Basketball Court', '* Short or Long Term Lease Available', '* Renters Insurance is Required', '* Sand Volleyball Court', '* Extra Storage', '* Reserved Parking', '* se habla espanol', '* Tennis Court', '* Outdoor Grill Area', '* After-Hours Emergency Maintenance', '* Swimming Pool', '* Non Smoking Community', '* Covered Parking', '* Laundry Care Center']
